document.full_text: a second lawsuit was filed against the league on behalf of retired players including carl eller and priest holmes and yet-to-be-drafted players. a hearing is set for wednesday.
document.title: n.f.l. says second lawsuit is unlikely to succeed
lines_and_colors: a second lawsuit was filed against the league on behalf of retired players including carl eller and priest holmes and yet-to-be-drafted players. a hearing is set for wednesday.
